description: The Juneberry (Amelanchier lamarckii) is a remarkable, hardy shrub that is a stunning addition to any garden. Its snowy white blossoms, abundant clusters of edible berries, and lush green foliage create an eye-catching effect of beauty throughout the season. Its short stature and wide canopy make it an ideal choice for borders and landscape edging, while its wildlife-attracting qualities make it a great choice for wildlife gardens. Not only is it great to look at, but the delicious berries are often used in jams, jellies and drinks for a sweet treat. Highly adaptable, this shrub thrives in sunny or partially shady settings, making it as easy to care for as it is pleasing to the eye.
